0.content:
WHERE
    (vehicle.stage_no = '1' or vehicle.stage_no = '0')
SELECT
    vehicle.stage.engine.group,
    launch_date.year,
    sum(orb_pay) -> orbital_payload,
HAVING
    orbital_payload > 0
;
0.name: Payload to Orbit (tonnes) by First Stage Fuel

2.content:
WHERE
    vehicle.stage_no = '1'
SELECT
    stage_identifier,
    org.state_code,
    org.hex,
    sum(orb_pay) -> orbital_payload,
ORDER BY
    orbital_payload desc
LIMIT 10
;
2.name: First Stage Example Launchers

content.markdown:
# Orbital Rocket Propellant Through The Years

Click charts to cross-filter. Global filters can be applied in the top search bar. Click 'edit' to customize everything - the dashboard is local to you, and safe to change. 

Data: *McDowell, Jonathan C., 2020. General Catalog of Artificial Space Objects, Release 1.7.3 , https://planet4589.org/space/gcat*

Rocket propulsion has relied on a wide range of fuels, each balancing power, efficiency, and practicality. Early spaceflight was dominated by kerosene and hypergolic propellantsâ€”reliable, storable, and suited for military use. Solid propellants enabled rapid-response launches and missiles. Over time, liquid oxygen + kerosene (LOX/Kero) became the workhorse of orbital launch, while LOX/Liquid Hydrogen offered unmatched efficiency for upper stages. Recently, new combinations like LOX/Methane are emerging, aiming for cleaner performance, reusability, and deep-space potential.

7.content:
WHERE
    vehicle.stage_no in ('2', '3', '4')
SELECT
    vehicle.stage.engine.group,
    launch_date.year,
    sum(orb_pay) -> orbital_payload,
HAVING
    orbital_payload > 0
    and vehicle.stage.engine.group is not null
;
7.name: Payload to Orbit (tonnes) by Upper Stage Fuel

9.content:
WHERE
    vehicle.stage_no in ('2', '3', '4')
SELECT
    stage_identifier,
    org.state_code,
    org.hex,
    sum(orb_pay) -> orbital_payload,
ORDER BY
    orbital_payload desc
LIMIT 10
;
9.name: Upper Stage Launchers

10.content:
SELECT
    org.flag,
ORDER BY
    org.flag asc
;
10.name: National Grouping (Click to filter, click title to clear)

11.content:
SELECT
    vehicle.stage.engine.group,
    vehicle.stage.engine.fuel,
    vehicle.stage.engine.fuel_hex,
    sum(orb_pay) -> payload_to_orbit,
    count(launch_tag ? orb_pay >0) as orbital_launches,
having
    vehicle.stage.engine.fuel is not null
ORDER BY
    orbital_launches desc
LIMIT 30
;
11.name: Fuel Groups

12.content:
WHERE
    (vehicle.stage_no = '1')
SELECT
    vehicle.stage.engine.group,
    vehicle.stage.engine.name,
    vehicle.stage.engine.isp,
    vehicle.stage.engine.thrust,
    sum(orb_pay) as  payload_to_orbit,
having 
    cast(vehicle.stage.engine.isp as int)>30 and
    payload_to_orbit> 0
order by payload_to_orbit desc
limit 150;
12.name: By Engine: ISP vs Thrust

13.content:
WHERE
    vehicle.stage_no in ('2', '3', '4')
SELECT
    vehicle.stage.engine.group,
    vehicle.stage.engine.name,
    vehicle.stage.engine.isp,
    vehicle.stage.engine.thrust,
    sum(orb_pay) as  payload_to_orbit,
having 
    cast(vehicle.stage.engine.isp as int)>30
order by payload_to_orbit desc
limit 150;
13.name: Upper Stage Engines: ISP vs Thrust

15.content:
SELECT
    era
ORDER BY
    era asc

;
15.name: Space Era (Click to filter, click title to clear)
